Ah, it's hot! Hot!\""},{"lineNumber":158874,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃあああああああ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaaaaaaah!"},{"lineNumber":158875,"originalJapaneseLine":"　火ッ！！　火がぁぁあああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Fire!! The fire!!\""},{"lineNumber":158876,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、わたしは……こんな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I, I am... like this..."},{"lineNumber":158877,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんなぁぁぁあ……ッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Like thiisss...!\""},{"lineNumber":158878,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うわっ、なんだこの炎は！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-ugh, what is this fire!?\""},{"lineNumber":158879,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、ハウゼルが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-Howser is...\""},{"lineNumber":158880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「怒ってる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Angry...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ハウゼルげーーーっと！」
「ふう……なんとかなって良かった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew... I'm glad it somehow worked out..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドラゴンパッチ七巻を見せて下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let me see volume seven of Dragon Patch."
"At least, at least before I die..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わわ、儂の本をそこまでして……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wah, you're going that far for my book...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを儂はあのような脅迫に屈し……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And yet I yielded to such blackmail...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その娘に本を読ませてはいかーん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You must not let that girl read the book!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしも読ませたら儂は死ぬぞーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If she reads it, I will dieーー!"
Feel free to read as much as you want."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ありがとうございます……！」
「のぉぉぉおおおおおおおおおおおおお！！！！」
ハウゼルは喜び勇んで、
まるで貪るように本を読み始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: began to read the book as if devouring it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ボスとの決着がどんな形になるだろうと思ったら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wondered what form the showdown with the boss would take,
and it ends in just two lines..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シリーズ初期から示唆されていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The sad farewell scene of the protagonists, suggested from the early series,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主人公達の悲しい別れのシーンが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the sad goodbye scene of the heroes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は別れたの一行で終わってる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ends with just a single line saying 'they parted ways'..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あと、アボガド姫が冒頭に事故で死んでる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, Princess Avocado dies in an accident at the beginning..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか展開がどうのと悩んでいるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since there was worry about how the story would develop,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら全員殺してしまえと助言したのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I advised to just kill them all off."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうだ、中々クレバーな解決策だろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How about that? Quite a clever solution, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ホーネット様のピンチにも関わらず、
こんな馬鹿げた変装までして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you even went so far as to make such a ridiculous disguise...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルの周りにメラメラと炎が現れだす。
と、驚けたのも短い時間、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The time they could be surprised was short,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辺り一面が火の海と化した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the whole area was engulfed in a sea of flames.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわあああああ！　あ、熱っ！　熱い！」
火ッ！！　火がぁぁあああ！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
